channel.title: Getting backround music off a client?
channel.description: I would like to know how you get the stupid runescape theme from playing on my client everytime I start it

item.title: Getting backround music off a client?
item.dc:creator: @oceano1 oceano1
item.description:
@oceano1 wrote:

[quote=“lary370, post:7, topic:333516”][quote author=oceano1 link=topic=429921.msg3158862#msg3158862 date=1269301941]

THERE SHOULD BE A MP3 FOLDER SOMTING LIKE THAT AND DELETE THE SONGS IN IT

When I do thsat and run the client the file comes back. Also you don’t need to use caps lock… Just learn to be abit more civilized with new people who want to learn
[/quote]

Then… idk![/quote] Thanks for not using all caps this time. Also thanks anyway

Read full topic
item.source: Getting backround music off a client?

item.title: Getting backround music off a client?
item.dc:creator: @oceano1 oceano1
item.description:
@oceano1 wrote:

No, what I mean is when I start my client the Runescape theme plays. I want to know how to get it to stop playing

Read full topic
item.source: Getting backround music off a client?

item.title: Getting backround music off a client?
item.dc:creator: @Nexus1 Nexus_
item.description:
@Nexus1 wrote:

You need either JFrame on your client or a music file dispatcher. Then just put the music (in mp3 style) into the folder and play it.

Read full topic
